resources.string: This project was made by Mikael Meinander and Kendy Nguyen for Metropolia UAS Android Sensor Based applications course
Use camera to scan food (like pizza or pasta, yam!) and get online recipes opened for you! After scanning alternative choice is to open map to navigate closest market near you!
Check your current location and navigate to nearest market!
Lists all the scanned item for you to ease remembering what you wanted to eat next or what you ate last time you used this app!
Welcome! Scan an item for a recipe!
